normalized: mizuki yukikaze is a taimanin.
wielding the two pistols "lightning shooters" in her handsand using the "thunder arts", she's the next generation's ace.
yukikaze's senpai is the taimanin akiyama rinko,who's also called the "demon cutter".
with yukikaze's childhood friend akiyama tatsurou, who's more thana friend but not yet her lover, the three undertake missions.
thanks to their achievements, yukikaze and rinkoare both selected for the "sheathed mission".
they will infiltrate the underground city of yomiharato rescue a taimanin that went missing 5 years ago:yukikaze's mother, mizuki shiranui.
however, to infiltrate this lawless district under the influence of hell,they will have to disguise as prostitutes.
for yukikaze and rinko, who have never laid with a man,it is a very harsh mission.
however, yukikaze and rinko are determinedas taimanin to accept the mission.
unaware of all this, tatsurou is depressed from having beentaken off the mission as his skills were insufficient.
yukikaze comforts tatsurou,and they confirm their mutual feelings by sharing a kiss.
to catch up with yukikaze, tatsurou decides to apply forelite taimanin training called "special camp".
this makes yukikaze very happy but, although she wanted to sleepwith tatsurou before becoming a prostitute for her mission,her secret wish doesn't come true.
rinko also wanted tatsurou to be the first man to have sex with her but,when she learns that he and yukikaze still didn't do it,she gives up on her plans.
in the end, yukikaze and rinko depart fortheir sheathed mission as virgins.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no matter what happens, i'll always belong to you, tatsurou.
don't ever forget that!
before parting, yukikaze tells tatsurou.
tatsurou didn't realize the true meaning of those words.
100 meters below tokyo.
once called the metropolitan area outer undergrounddischarge channel project, it was halted midway,and left behind unfinished.
this tank, intended to regulate the water pressure flowingfrom the underground tunnels,
is 117 meters in length by 78 in width, and contain 59 gargantuanconcrete pillars standing next to each other.
a few sparse lights fixed on the ceilingbarely keep the darkness at bay.
two taimanin, yukikaze and rinko, walk under that cold glare.
there is no sign of life around.
only moving are the two silhouettes walking silently on the wet ground.
however, creatures lurk deep in the long shadows.
unable to bear the brilliant sun.
critters outside the scope of rational knowledge.
they were entering an entirely different dominion.
a place ruled by demons and devoid of hope.
yomihara, the buried city.
such was their destination.
it's been several hours since they entered the drainage system.
no words have been exchanged since then.
rinko was opening the way, but stops suddenly.
while it takes yukikaze aback,as a taimanin she knows better than to ask her why.
still and silent, yukikaze narrows her eyes and scan forward.
soon enough, she detects the reason why rinko halted,and the two exchange an eye signal.

name: rinko
normalized: slave trader zokuto, i presume?
rinko's voice echoes in the underground structure.

name: zokuto
normalized: hehehe…as expected from the famed taimanin.
a man shows up from behind a pillar.
he's short and paunchy, with dark skin and pointed ears.
he only has a scar for a left eye,but the right one overlooks nothing, glimmering in the darkness.
his skin and eye color marks him as a non-human.

name: rinko
normalized: this isn't the place we agreed on.
why did you try to conceal your presence?
rinko coldly asks.

name: zokuto
normalized: easy there, dont get the wrong idea.
i just got bored of waiting for you so i came to pick you up.
zokuto raises his hands in an exaggerated fashion.

name: zokuto
normalized: tough neighbourhood around here, ya know?
that's why i ducked a bit.
you caught me anyway, so no hard feelings, eh?

name: yukikaze
normalized: isn't sneaking around par for the course for a slave trader?
yukikaze makes no effort to hide her disdain.

name: zokuto
normalized: right on, eheh.
my name's zokuto and they say i'm a cheap bastard.
nice to meetcha, ladies.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hmph.
yukikaze's only answer to zokuto'singratiating smile is a scornful snort.
her displeasure is easy to explain.
zokuto is a denizen of hell.
he belongs to the lower caste of an influential race called the mazoku.
publicly, he poses as a human running an import-export business.
his true colors are, as yukikaze said, those of a slave trader.
humans or demons, "everything is on the menu".
he will hunt out all kind of sentient species andsell as many as possible, for that's his livelihood.
while he was conducting business outside the buried city,he was arrested by a taimanin agent.

by all rights he should have been executed on the spot, but whenit became apparent he held valuable knowledge about yomihara,he was offered the opportunity to help rinko and yukikazeon their sheathed mission in exchange for his life.
although it's for the sake of the mission, yukikaze's strongsense of justice makes her skin crawl just looking at him.
rinko sends a fleeting glance at her, but keeps silent.
unlike her partner, her face betrays nothing,but there's no doubt she shares her feelings.

name: rinko
normalized: zokuto, i think you understand…
before she can even finish, zokuto goes down on his knees.

name: zokuto
normalized: sure!
i do, i do!
no need for repeats!
if i can go back to my old businessafter i give you a hand, i'm 100% on board!

name: yukikaze
normalized: old business?
you know what'll happen then, right?
yukikaze makes a gun with her fingers and aims atzokuto's head.
a few sparks spurt from her taut index.

name: zokuto
normalized: th-that was the deal!
still bowing, zokuto gulps hard.

name: rinko
normalized: then let's make this quick.
guide us to yomihara at once.

name: zokuto
normalized: right-o!
for sure!
stick to me!
this way!
zokuto breaks into a theme park guide impersonation,urging the two to come with him.

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze, let's go.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes.
the pair start following the abnormaly amiable mazoku.
let's go over the mission again.
yukikaze and rinko are to find taimanin shiranui,who went missing in action during a spying missioninside the buried city, yomihara.
the rescue mission was organized after it was recentlyconfirmed that taimanin shiranui was still alive.
however, yomihara is notoriously hard to infiltrate,as neither the government nor the taimaninhold any sway in this lawless city.
moreover, only two kinds of women exist down there,the prostitutes and the slaves.
yukikaze and rinko plan to pass as the former.
that undercover infiltration was called the matoi missionby the taimanin.
to do so, a contact was arranged on the enemy side, a slaver familiar with the place named zokuto.
they will first impersonate pitiful slaves captured by zokuto.
he will then proceed to sell them to a brothel,from where they will start their investigationswhile pretending to work there.
meanwhile, the liaison with the taimanin headquartersabove ground will be assured by the slave trader.
the same zokuto currently kowtowingobsequiously to the pair as he guides them,hoping to resume his business in the future.
seeing a tough-looking guy acting like thatmakes the girls share a wry smile.

name: rinko
normalized: such a small fry.
if he's any indication,maybe yomihara won't be so harsh after all.
rinko makes that comment to yukikaze.
more hushed than a whisper, the words hardly pass her lips,only picked up by their earphones.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's right, rinko-senpai.
with some luck…

name: rinko
normalized: yes.
we're pretending to be prostitutes,but we might not have to go all the way.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yomihara is under hell's rule, and because neitherwe taimanin nor the government have any influencethere, we were told to remain extremely vigilant…

name: rinko
normalized: although we'll be disguised as prostitutes,it may be hard to blend in to investigatewithout actually having to act as one.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes.
about that…i have steeled my resolve.

name: rinko
normalized: so have i.
but if we only have to deal with small frieslike that guide zokuto, maybe we can avoid falling on that sword.

name: yukikaze
normalized: but if that's the mission…ah, don't get any weird ideas,it's duty, not that it's indispensable that i lose my virginity.

name: rinko
normalized: the mission is what it is.
it's best not to let your imagination run wild.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's right.
as you say.
so, you're a virgin too, rinko-senpai?

name: rinko
normalized: hu…w-well, that's correct.
as their steps bring them closer to the buried city,the two girls' conversation slips off-topic.
were they really holding such naive expectations?
or, as their destination looms near, did they tryto distract themselves from the dread of their deflowering?
only one thing is certain: neither of themgrasped the full magnitude of the "harsh duty"asagi-sensei warned them about.
despite their great talent - or maybe because of it -the two are unprepared for true hardship,be it as taimanin or as women.
guided by a slave merchant, rinko and yukikazeadvance deep within the boundaries of hell.
they aren't aware that they will pay in fullthe price of their inexperience.
about four hours later.
the vast tunnel has been replaced by a narrow shaft.
while some reinforcements can be seen, the bedrock aroundis largely untouched, though peppered with lateral passages.
a thick electric cable runs on the ceiling,powering crude lights every ten meters or so.
in the dim passage filled with damp air,only the subdued respirations of three people can be heard.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i don't like this.
her patience probably growing thin, yukikaze mutters unconsciously.

name: rinko
normalized: right.

name: yukikaze
normalized: this place is?

name: rinko
normalized: an underground shaft.
i've heard about a hidden mine under tokyo,built by the houjou clan.

name: yukikaze
normalized: a hidden mine…

name: rinko
normalized: this is most likely one of the levels of that mine.
we must be about 150 meters below ground.

name: zokuto
normalized: right-o!
from here it's proper hell territory.
zokuto interrupts the two.

name: zokuto
normalized: latest news is we got some ogre and trolls gone loco around here,the kind we used to guard our merchandise.
and also somethingabout some fresh refugees group packing some serious heat.
you hear boom, run the other way.

normalized: hmph!
no matter what comes out we'll be fine.

normalized: nuh-uh, you didn't catch my drift…

normalized: what're you trying to say?
yukikaze raises an eyebrow.
zokuto shakes his head theatrically.

normalized: like i said, from right here, we're on proper hell turf.
you can bet there'll be rats keeping tabs on us the whole way.

whaddya think is gonna happen when thebig shots in the city find out a couple of slaves wasted a fewdozens ogres and tooled up refugees?

is his intention finally dawning on the girls?

now looking like legitimate chattel,they get start getting dragged forward by zokuto.

taimanin place the mission's success above everything else.
however, had they known the true nature of their bindings,they may have proceeded differently.
forged in hell, the shackles can withstand the strength of three ogres.
